comment.author: 70394046@N04
comment._content: What a wonderful picture!  The steadfast friendship of dogs like this one was a great help to the soldiers' morale during the Civil War, just as the presence of dogs helps American soldiers in war zones today.  War has certainly changed in 150 years, but the relationship between soldiers and their dogs has not. It is a bond like no other.
